text: The Black Hand is a 1906 American silent crime drama movie directed by Wallace McCutcheonTHE BLACK HANDThe Black Hand and stars Anthony O'Sullivan. ==Actors== *Anthony O'Sullivan and Robert G. Vignola as the extortionists ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1906 movies Category:1900s crime movies Category:1900s drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Wallace McCutcheon Sr.
title: The Black Hand (1906 movie)
